Data::Iterator

Data::Iterator Class Reference

Specialized iterator which iterate on the features contained in features for the cluster specified in the constructor. More...

#include <data.h>

QPoint operator() (dataType dimensionX, dataType dimensionY) const
 Returns a QPoint for the given dimensions for the current spike for the cluster on which this class iterates Caution: in Qt graphical coordinate system, the Y axis is inverted (increasing downwards), thus a point (x,y) as to be drawn and tested as (x,-y).

Detailed Description

Specialized iterator which iterate on the features contained in features for the cluster specified in the constructor.

Member Function Documentation

QPoint Data::Iterator::operator() ( dataType  dimensionX,
dataType  dimensionY 
) const [inline]

Returns a QPoint for the given dimensions for the current spike for the cluster on which this class iterates Caution: in Qt graphical coordinate system, the Y axis is inverted (increasing downwards), thus a point (x,y) as to be drawn and tested as (x,-y).

Parameters:
dimensionX the feature used as the absciss
dimensionY the feature used as the ordinate
Returns:
a QPoint for the couple (dimensionX,dimensionY) taking the Qt graphical coordinate system into consideration, the ordinate coordinate is the opposite of the raw data.

dataType Data::Iterator::operator() ( dataType  dimension  )  const [inline]

Returns the specified feature for the current spike for the cluster on which this class iterates.

Parameters:
dimension the feature requested
Returns:
the value of the feature.
